required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial of a Recombinant Adenovirus 5 Vectored COVID-19 Vaccine (Ad5-nCoV) With Two Doses in Healthy Adults
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of a Recombinant Adenovirus 5 Vectored COVID-19 Vaccine (Ad5-nCoV) With Two Doses in Healthy Adults Aged 18 Years and Older

lead_sponsor.agency: Institute of Biotechnology, Academy of Military Medical Sciences, PLA of China

clinical_study.source: Institute of Biotechnology, Academy of Military Medical Sciences, PLA of China

brief_summary.textblock: This is a clinical trial to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of a recombinant adenovirus 5 vectored COVID-19 vaccine (Ad5-nCoV) with two doses and with different adminstration routes in healthy adults aged 18 years and older.

detailed_description.textblock: A total of 168 healthy adult volunteers will be vaccinated in this clinical trial according to open, partly randomized design from the healthy adults aged 18 years and older. The safety and immunogenicity of intramuscular vaccination and mucosal vaccination of two doses of Ad5-nCoV in different administration schedules will be evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of the AE in all groups
primary_outcome.description: The occurrence of AE in all groups within 0-7 days after each vaccination;

primary_outcome.measure: Seroconversion rate of the IgG antibody against SARS-CoV-2
primary_outcome.description: Seroconversion rate the IgG antibody against SARS-CoV-2 measured on Day 28 after last vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: Geomean titers of the IgG antibody against SARS-CoV-2
primary_outcome.description: Geomean titers of the IgG antibody against SARS-CoV-2 measured on Day 28 after last vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: Seroconversion rate of the neutralizing antibody against SARS-CoV-2
primary_outcome.description: Seroconversion rate of the neutralizing antibody against SARS-CoV-2 measured on Day 28 after last vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: Geomean titers of the neutralizing antibody against SARS-CoV-2
primary_outcome.description: Geomean titers of the neutralizing antibody against SARS-CoV-2 measured on Day 28 after last vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of the AE in all groups
secondary_outcome.description: The occurrence of AE in all groups within 0-30 minutes and 0-28 days after each vaccination.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Serious adverse events (SAE) in all groups
secondary_outcome.description: The occurrence of Serious adverse events (SAE) in all groups within 6 months after the final vaccination.

secondary_outcome.measure: Geomean titers of the IgG antibody against SARS-CoV-2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0, 14, 28 and 56 after first vaccination and Day 14 and Day168 after last vaccination.
secondary_outcome.description: Geomean titers of the IgG antibody against SARS-CoV-2 measured on Day 0, 14, 28 and 56 after first vaccination and on Day 14 and Day168 after last vaccination.

secondary_outcome.measure: Seroconversion rate of the IgG antibody against SARS-CoV-2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0, 14, 28 and 56 after first vaccination and Day 14 and Day168 after last vaccination.
secondary_outcome.description: Seroconversion rate of the IgG antibody against SARS-CoV-2 measured on Day 0, 14, 28 and 56 after first vaccination and on Day 14 and Day168 after last vaccination.

secondary_outcome.measure: Geomean titers of the neutralizing antibody against SARS-CoV-2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0, 14, 28 and 56 after first vaccination and Day 14 and Day168 after last vaccination.
secondary_outcome.description: Geomean titers of the neutralizing antibody against SARS-CoV-2 measured on Day 0, 14, 28 and 56 after first vaccination and on Day 14 and Day168 after last vaccination.

secondary_outcome.measure: Seroconversion rate of the neutralizing antibody against SARS-CoV-2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0, 14, 28 and 56 after first vaccination and on Day 14 and Day168 after last vaccination.
secondary_outcome.description: Seroconversion rate of the neutralizing antibody against SARS-CoV-2 measured on Day 0, Day14, Day 28 or Day 56 after first vaccination and on day 14, day 28 and day168 after last vaccination.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 and Day 14 after each vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: The positive rate of IFN-γ stimulated by S protein overlapping peptide library detected by ELISpot on Day 0 and Day 14 after each vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Geomean titers of neutralizing antibody response to Ad5-vector
secondary_outcome.description: Geomean titers of neutralizing antibody response to Ad5-vector on Day 0, 14 and 28 after each vaccination.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 and Day 14 after each vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: The positive rate of the specific cytokines expressed by CD4+ and CD8+ T lymphocytes stimulated by S protein overlapping peptide library detected by intracellular cytokine staining on Day 0 and Day 14 after each vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Geomean titers of the IgA antibody against SARS-CoV-2
secondary_outcome.description: Geomean titers of the IgA antibody against SARS-CoV-2 on Day 0, 14 and 28 after each vaccination.

arm_group.description: 24 subjects. 5E10 VP of Ad5-nCoV on Day 0 and on Day 56.
24 subjects. An intramuscular administration of 5E10 VP of Ad5-nCoV on day 0 and a mucosal administration of 2E10 VP on Day 28.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group C: Mucosal administration, high dose
arm_group.description: 24 subjects. A mucosal administration of 2E10 VP of Ad5-nCoV on Day 0 and Day 28.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group D: Mucosal administration, low dose
arm_group.description: 24 subjects. A mucosal administration of 1E10 VP of Ad5-nCoV on day 0 and Day 28.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group E: Intramuscular administration, one dose
arm_group.description: 24 subjects. An intramuscular administration of 5E10 VP of Ad5-nCoV on day 0.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group F: Intramuscular administration, two doses
arm_group.description: 24 subjects. Two intramuscular administrations of 5E10 VP of Ad5-nCoV at left and right arms on day 0.

intervention.description: Recombinant Novel Coronavirus Vaccine (Adenovirus Type 5 Vector)
intervention.arm_group_label: Group C: Mucosal administration, high dose
Group D: Mucosal administration, low dose
Group E: Intramuscular administration, one dose
Group F: Intramuscular administration, two doses
